replies.body: You are a really nice guy (ur voice is really nice) and you are pretty damn good at the game. I also didn't realize you are really good at building maps xd. I look forward to working with you more

reply_to.body: And I forgot, Opinions?
reply_to.body_tagged: And I forgot, Opinions?

replies.body:
What are your thoughts of the Builder rank being brought back? Also, what are you excited for as a Builder yourself?

If you could change one thing on Avicus, what would it be and why?

Opinion?
replies.body_tagged:
What are your thoughts of the Builder rank being brought back? Also, what are you excited for as a Builder yourself?

If you could change one thing on Avicus, what would it be and why?

Opinion?

replies.body:
I think its a good way to get a lot of projects done in a quicker yet more effective manner, and it also brings new faces to the map dev team. Im excited to learn a lot more about how Avicus maps work, and I am really looking forward to making maps with people, and creating a better experience for Avicus players

If I could change one thing it would probably be to have public players have an easier time getting into the community, to hopefully increase the competitive population.

I think you are a really really good senior mod. You are trustworthy and you are always there to help.
replies.body_tagged:
I think its a good way to get a lot of projects done in a quicker yet more effective manner, and it also brings new faces to the map dev team. Im excited to learn a lot more about how Avicus maps work, and I am really looking forward to making maps with people, and creating a better experience for Avicus players

If I could change one thing it would probably be to have public players have an easier time getting into the community, to hopefully increase the competitive population.

I think you are a really really good senior mod. You are trustworthy and you are always there to help.
